entityAnalysis.purpose: System users including students, administrators, and dormitory leaders
entityAnalysis.reasoning: interaction-created with canBeDeleted: false requires Transform with InteractionEventEntity

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's full name for identification
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set directly on creation
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly on creation

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's email address for identification and communication
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set directly on creation
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly on creation

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's role in the system (student, administrator, dormitory_leader)
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set on creation, updated by role assignment interactions
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has interactionDependencies that can modify the property (I301, I302)
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set on creation, updated by role assignment interactions

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's current status (active, inactive)
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has potential interaction dependencies for status changes
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's cumulative behavior score based on violations
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Base score (100) minus sum of all violation score deductions, can be overridden by admin
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Complex calculation with multiple entities (BehaviorViolation, UserViolationRelation) and interaction override capability (I201, I202)
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Summation: Base score (100) minus sum of all violation score deductions, can be overridden by admin

propertyAnalysis.purpose: User's contact phone number
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set directly on creation if provided
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly on creation if provided

entityAnalysis.reasoning: interaction-created with soft-delete allows Transform for creation + status StateMachine for deletion

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Unique name identifying the dormitory
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set directly from creation payload
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly from creation payload

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Physical location description of the dormitory
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set directly from creation payload
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly from creation payload

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Maximum number of beds in this dormitory
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set from bedCount in creation payload
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set from bedCount in creation payload

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Current operational status of the dormitory
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has interaction dependencies for status changes and supports soft-delete pattern
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Count of beds that are currently occupied
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Count of occupied beds linked to this dormitory
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has dataDependencies with relations and computationMethod contains 'count of'
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Count of Bed entities where isOccupied = true and BedDormitory links to this dormitory

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Number of unoccupied beds available for assignment
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: maxBeds minus currentOccupancy
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Only uses own entity properties (maxBeds, currentOccupancy)
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Custom: maxBeds minus currentOccupancy

entityAnalysis.reasoning: lifecycle.creation.type is created-with-parent, created by parent's computation

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Unique identifier for the bed within the dormitory
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Generated uniquely within dormitory during creation
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: controlType is creation-only, controlled by entity creation
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Generated uniquely within dormitory during creation

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Whether the bed is currently assigned to a user
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: True if there exists an active UserBedAssignment for this bed
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has dataDependencies with relations and computationMethod contains 'any'
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Any: True if there exists an active UserBedAssignment for this bed

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Current status of the bed (active, maintenance, etc.)
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Has interaction dependencies for status changes
propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set on creation, can be updated by status change interactions

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Detailed description of the specific violation incident

propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Set directly from creation payload

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Points deducted from user's behavior score for this violation

propertyAnalysis.calculationMethod: Looked up from ViolationRules dictionary based on violationType

propertyAnalysis.purpose: When the violation was recorded

propertyAnalysis.purpose: URL or reference to supporting evidence
